def PreprocessData(df,dirname):
  # „Éá„Éº„Çø„ÅÆÂâçÂá¶ÁêÜÈñ¢Êï∞
  # ËæûÊõ∏Âûã„ÇíËøî„Åô

  mecab = MeCab.Tagger('-Ochasen')

  # text„Éá„Éº„Çø„ÅÆÂâçÂá¶ÁêÜ
  df = TextPreprocess(df)

  label2index = {k: i for i, k in enumerate(df.target.unique())}
  index2label = {i: k for i, k in enumerate(df.target.unique())}

  class_count = len(label2index)
  labels = utils.to_categorical([label2index[label] for label in df.target], num_classes=class_count)

  features,sentences,vectorian,account = MakeFeatures(df)

  return {
      'class_count': class_count,
      'label2index': label2index,
      'index2label': index2label,
      'labels': labels,
      'features': features,
      'sentences':sentences,
      'input_len': vectorian.max_tokens_len,
      'vectorian':vectorian,
      'account':account
  }

def TextPreprocess(df):
  for i in df.index:
    sen = df.loc[i,'sentence']
    sen = mojimoji.han_to_zen(sen)
    sen = re.sub(r'\d+','0',sen)
    df.loc[i,'sentence'] = sen.replace('\u3000','')
  return df

def MakeFeatures(df):
  vectorian = SentencePieceVectorian()

  features = []
  sentences = []
  accounts = []
  for feature,account in zip(df['sentence'],df['account_name']):
    f = vectorian.fit(feature).indices
    features.append(f)
    sentences.append(feature)
    accounts.append(account)

  features = pad_sequences(features, maxlen=vectorian.max_tokens_len)

  return features,sentences,vectorian,accounts

def CollectData(data,account):
  features = []
  sentences = []
  labels = []
  
  for ac in account:
    where_ = np.where(np.array(data['account']) == ac)
    features.extend(np.array(data['features'])[where_])
    sentences.extend(np.array(data['sentences'])[where_])
    labels.extend(np.array(data['labels'])[where_])
  return np.array(features),np.array(sentences),np.array(labels)

def _create_model(input_shape, hidden, class_count,vectorian):
    input_tensor = Input(input_shape)
    common_input = vectorian.get_keras_layer(trainable=True)(input_tensor)
    x1 = SeqSelfAttention(name='attention')(common_input)
    x1 = Bidirectional(LSTM(hidden))(x1)
    x1 = Dropout(0.5)(x1)
    x1 = Dense(32)(x1)
    x1 = Dropout(0.5)(x1)
    x1 = Dense(16)(x1)
    x1 = Dropout(0.5)(x1)
    output_tensor = Dense(class_count, activation='softmax', name='class')(x1)

    model = Model(input_tensor, output_tensor)
    model.compile(loss='categorical_crossentropy', optimizer='nadam', metrics=['acc'])

    return model

  wei = out[1][i]

  labels = [data['index2label'][np.argmax(test_labels[i])]]

  for j in df.index:

      df.loc[j,'weight'] = 0
    else:

  pred += df.token.values.tolist()
  labels += df.weight.values.tolist()

  elif (pred[0]  == 'app') & (labels[0] == 'disapp'):

  elif (pred[0]  == 'disapp') & (labels[0] == 'app'):

module CustomRackMiddleware
  class SetSameSiteOptionOnCookie
    def initialize(app)
      @app = app
    end

    def call(env)
      status, headers, body = @app.call(env)

      cookies = headers['Set-Cookie']
      if cookies.present?
        processed_cookies = cookies.split("\n").map do |cookie|
          "#{cookie}; SameSite=None; Secure"
        end
        headers['Set-Cookie'] = processed_cookies.join("\n")
      end

      [status, headers, body]
    end
  end
end

def testLastDayOfMonth(self):
    base = datetime(2015, 9, 4)

#!/usr/bin/perl
# crop_pdf.pl - PDF„ÅÆ‰ΩôÁôΩ„ÇíÈô§Âéª

use utf8;
use strict;
use warnings;

# ‰ΩôÁôΩÈô§Âéª„ÇíË°å„Çè„Åö„Å´„Çπ„Ç≠„ÉÉ„Éó„Åô„Çã„Éö„Éº„Ç∏Êï∞
my $skip_page = 2;  # ÂÖàÈ†≠„ÅÆ2„Éö„Éº„Ç∏ÔºàË°®Á¥ô„Å®Ë£èË°®Á¥ôÔºâ

die "Usage: $0 file top right bottom left\n" unless @ARGV == 5;
my $filename_in = $ARGV[0];

# CropBox „Å´Âêà„Çè„Åõ„Å¶Ê†ºÁ¥çÔºàleft, bottom, right, topÔºâ
my @offset = ($ARGV[4], $ARGV[3], -$ARGV[2], -$ARGV[1]);

open my $in, '<', $filename_in or die;
(my $filename_out = $filename_in) =~ s/(.*)(\.pdf)$/$1-cropped$2/;
open my $out, '>', $filename_out or die;

binmode $in;
binmode $out;

my $page = 0;
while (<$in>) {
    s/(\/CropBox\s*\[\s*([^\[]+)\])/crop($1, $2)/eg;
    print $out $_;
}

sub crop {
    $page++;
    return $_[0] if $page <= $skip_page;

    my @offset = @offset;
    my @pos = map{int $_ + shift @offset} split /\s+/, $_[1];

    my $crop = sprintf '/CropBox[%d %d %d %d]', @pos;

    my $blank = length($_[0]) - length $crop;
    warn $_[0] and return $_[0] if $blank < 0;

    return $crop.(' ' x $blank);
}

„Åæ„Åö„ÄÅ„Åì„Çå„Åå„Ç¢„Ç¶„Éà„É©„Ç§„É≥„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„ÄÇInkscape „Åß‰ΩúÊàê„Åó„ÄÅSVG„Å®„Åó„Å¶‰øùÂ≠ò„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Ç¢„Ç¶„Éà„É©„Ç§„É≥„ÅØ outline „Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÂêçÂâç„ÅÆ„É¨„Ç§„É§„Éº„ÅÆ‰∏≠„Å´‰Ωú„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÄÇ‰ªÆÊÉ≥„Éú„Éá„Ç£„ÅÆ„Çµ„Ç§„Ç∫„ÅØ100px„Å®„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ

„Åì„Çå„Çí„Ç∞„É™„Éï„Åî„Å®„Å´ÂàÜÂâ≤„Åó„ÄÅ1ÊñáÂ≠ó1„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Å´„Åô„Çã„ÄÇ‰ªäÂõû„ÅØÔºà„ÇÇÔºüÔºâPerl „ÅßÁ∞°Âçò„Å™„Çπ„ÇØ„É™„Éó„Éà„ÇíÊõ∏„Åç„ÄÅ„Åì„Çå„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åó„Åü„ÄÇÂçòÁ¥î„Å™„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅpath Ë¶ÅÁ¥†‰ª•Â§ñ„ÅÆË¶ÅÁ¥†Ôºà„Ç∞„É´„Éº„Éó„ÇÇÂê´„ÇÄÔºâ„Å´ÂØæÂøú„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å™„ÅÑ„Å™„Å©„ÅÑ„Çç„ÅÑ„Çç„Å®Âà∂Èôê„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çã„ÄÇ„Åæ„Åü XML::Simple „ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÂÆüË°å„Åô„Çã„Å´„ÅØ XML::Simple „ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´„ÅåÂøÖË¶Å„ÄÇ

  • split_svg.pl
#!/usr/bin/perl
#
# SVG„Çí„Ç∞„É™„Éï„Åî„Å®„Å´ÂàÜÂâ≤
# usage: perl split_svg.pl svg_sheet.svg list.txt

use strict;
use warnings;
use autodie;
use utf8;
use 5.010;
binmode STDOUT, ":utf8";

use constant OUT_DIR => "glyphs";
use constant PIXELS_PER_EM =>  100;
use constant UNITS_PER_EM  => 1000;

use XML::Simple;

my ($svg_file, $list_file) = @ARGV;

# SVG Ë™≠„ÅøËæº„Åø
my $svg = XMLin($svg_file, forcearray => 1, keyattr => []);

# Ë°åÊï∞„ÉªÂàóÊï∞„ÇíÊ±Ç„ÇÅ„Çã
my $row_max = int ($svg->{height} / PIXELS_PER_EM) - 1;
my $col_max = int ($svg->{width} / PIXELS_PER_EM) - 1;

# outline „É¨„Ç§„É§„Éº„ÇíÊé¢„Åô
my $groups = $svg->{g};
my $group_outline;
foreach my $group (@$groups) {
  if ($group->{'inkscape:label'} eq "outline") {
    $group_outline = $group;
    last;
  }
}
die "outline„É¨„Ç§„É§„Éº„ÅåÂ≠òÂú®„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì" unless defined $group_outline;

# Â§âÊèõË°åÂàó„ÇíÊ±Ç„ÇÅ„Çã
my $transform = $group_outline->{transform};
my ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f) = (1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0);
if (!defined $transform) {
  # noop
} elsif ($transform =~ m/translate\((?<tx>-?\d+(.\d+)?(e-?\d+)?),(?<ty>-?\d+(.\d+)?(e-?\d+)?)\)/) {
  $e = $+{tx};
  $f = $+{ty};
} elsif ($transform =~ m/matrix\((?<a>-?\d+(.\d+)?(e-?\d+)?),(?<b>-?\d+(.\d+)?(e-?\d+)?)\),(?<c>-?\d+(.\d+)?(e-?\d+)?),(?<d>-?\d+(.\d+)?(e-?\d+)?),(?<e>-?\d+(.\d+)?(e-?\d+)?),(?<f>-?\d+(.\d+)?(e-?\d+)?)/) {
  $a = $+{a};  $c = $+{c};  $e = $+{e};
  $b = $+{b};  $d = $+{d};  $f = $+{f};
} else {
  die "Êú™ÂØæÂøú„ÅÆtransform„Åß„Åô: $transform"
}

# „Ç∞„É™„Éï„Åî„Å®„Å´ path „ÇíÊ†ºÁ¥ç„Åô„ÇãÂ§âÊï∞
my @glyphs = ();
foreach my $row (0 .. $row_max) {
  foreach my $col (0 .. $col_max) {
    $glyphs[$row][$col] = [];
  }
}

# @glyphs „Å´„Éë„Çπ„ÇíÊ†ºÁ¥ç
my $paths = $group_outline->{path};
foreach my $path (@$paths) {
  my @data_args = split /\s+/, $path->{d};
  my $new_data = "";
  my ($col, $row);
  my $is_moveto_point = 1;
  foreach my $data_arg (@data_args) {
    if ($data_arg =~ m/(?<x>-?\d+(.\d+)?),(?<y>-?\d+(.\d+)?)/) {
      my $x = $+{x};
      my $y = $+{y};
      if ($is_moveto_point) {
        $x = $a * $x + $c * $y + $e;
        $y = $b * $x + $d * $y + $f;
        $col = int ($x / PIXELS_PER_EM);
        $row = int ($y / PIXELS_PER_EM);
        $x %= PIXELS_PER_EM;
        $y %= PIXELS_PER_EM;
        $is_moveto_point = 0;
      }
      $x *= UNITS_PER_EM / PIXELS_PER_EM;

my @glyphname_list = ();
open my $fh_list, '<:utf8', $list_file;
while (my $line = <$fh_list>) {

foreach my $row (0 .. $row_max) {

    open my $fh_out, '>', OUT_DIR . "/$glyphname.svg";
    print $fh_out $svg_string;
    close $fh_out;
  }
}

exit 0;
